text: Linda Kozlowski (born January 7, 1958) is an American former actress. She has been nominated for a Golden Globe Award. She is known for her role as Sue Charlton in "Crocodile" Dundee. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Fairfield, Connecticut
title: Linda Kozlowski
